DOC.brief_summary: OBJECTIVES : I . Determine toxicity cyclophosphamide rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin patient diffuse systemic sclerosis . II . Determine efficacy regimen term control disease patient .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Pilot Study Cyclophosphamide Rabbit Anti-Thymocyte Globulin Salvage Therapy Patients With Diffuse Systemic Sclerosis
DOC.detailed_description: PROTOCOL OUTLINE : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV 1-2 hour day 1 rabbit anti-thymocyte globulin IV 6-8 hour day 2-5 . Patients follow day 60-85 every 3 month 1 year .
